channel.title: ROS2 Tutorial on Dan Aukes

item.title: Installing ROS2 on a Raspberry Pi Zero 2W
item.description: Flashing Make sure you add your ssh key during flashing setup wifi define a hostname Installing It’s important to disable automatic updates as you should initiate it according to your own availability.

item.title: Installing ROS2 on an Ubuntu 22 Virtual Machine
item.description: ip a sudo apt update && sudo apt full-upgrade -y sudo shutdown now sudo apt install ubuntu-desktop-minimal sudo shutdown now
